channel.title: Boot Clock Randomization
channel.description:
If Kicksecure will be with tor disabled as base host sdwdate will be disabled too
then how to monitor Boot Clock Randomization
mousepad /var/log/bootclockrandomization.log nano /var/log/bootclockrandomization.log
shows empty text what should these command outputs

item.title: Boot Clock Randomization
item.dc:creator: suse211213
item.description:
Edit
only this worked

sudo journalctl -b --no-pager -u bootclockrandomization

Read full topic

item.title: Boot Clock Randomization
item.dc:creator: suse211213
item.description:
If Kicksecure will be with tor disabled as base host
sdwdate will be disabled too

then how to monitor Boot Clock Randomization

mousepad /var/log/bootclockrandomization.log
nano /var/log/bootclockrandomization.log

shows empty text
what should these command outputs
